description:
In battle, there are no equals.

Unmatched is a highly asymmetrical miniature fighting game for two or four players. Each hero is represented by a unique deck designed to evoke their style and legend. Tactical movement and no-luck combat resolution create a unique play experience that rewards expertise, but just when you've mastered one set, new heroes arrive to provide all new match-ups.

Unmatched: Realms Fall features Eredin, Philippa, and Triss & Yennefe. and two battlefields, featuring a brand new map mechanic, from the Witcher series.

Yennefer and Triss introduce an Unmatched first: You choose who is the hero and who is the sidekick, with different special abilities for each. Philippa is a powerful sorceress and schemer, who never runs out of cards.
King Eredin commands a horde of Wild Hunt Riders, only growing stronger when they are struck down.
short_description: Eredin, Philippa, Triss and Yennefer join Unmatched.
